lines.text: What does Ned see in a nineteen year old girl?
She happens to be a very smart girl. She knows a lot about the world and stuff like that. Ned appreciates these kind of things, you know.
[after a cop sexually blackmailed her in order to drop her wrongful charges]
I just wanna go home. I wanna take a shower. A nice slow shower! And then I wanna sleep for a couple of days. And then I wanna press charges! And you're a witness.
Let it go, Michelle. Ah, you don't need the aggravation.
Why don't you look at it like a learning experience? As a cosmic event of humanity, that you learn, you grasp on to, and you know more about mankind because of it.
